tasks.label: Load Extension in Chrome
args:
Session Guardian Extension Ready!

To test the extension:
1. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/
2. Enable 'Developer mode' (top right toggle)
3. Click 'Load unpacked' and select this directory: /Users/iridwan/opensource-ideas
4. The Session Guardian extension should appear in your extensions
5. Pin it to the toolbar for easy access

Features to test:
- Auto-save (wait 5+ minutes)
- Manual session save via popup
- Session restoration
- Scroll position tracking
- Crash recovery (kill Chrome process)

All files are ready for development!
